overview: When gorgeous director Bobbi Starr gets together with her girlfriends for an all-female jam session, the result is nothing like your average lesbian porn. Bobbi's young pals are not only beautiful and horny, but they love making their asses dilate to extreme dimensions! Bobbi's double-disc "Gape Gang" contains four epic, orgiastic scenes of rectal insanity with the director's showboating co-stars in an all-out competition to be the most inventive and anally perverse. title: Gape Gang
